com.planepanic.game.gfx

Class Drawable

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.planepanic.game.gfx.Drawable
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Button, Image, Plane, PointOfInterest, Runway, TextBox

    public abstract class Drawable
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class used to represent objects which can be drawn to the screen.
    Author:
    Thomas Cheyney, Jonathan
